title: ETtech Explainer: Amazon's latest Tranium chip and what it means for the race
description: Amazon Web Services has launched Trainium3, its new AI chip, offering faster performance, more memory, and lower energy use. The next-generation Trainium4 will add Nvidia’s NVLink Fusion for even bigger, faster AI servers. These chips give AWS more control, c…
content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has spent years creating its own AI training hardware, and its newest release, Trainium3, is touted to perform far better than earlier versions.At its annual tech conference… [+3370 chars]
